author: By ROBERT JABLON Associated Press
title: More than 50 infected with virus at California nursing home
description: LOS ANGELES (AP) — A Southern California nursing home has been hit hard by the coronavirus, with more than 50 residents infected — a troubling development amid cautious optimism that cases in the state may peak more slowly than expected.
content:
LOS ANGELES (AP) A Southern California nursing home has been hit hard by the coronavirus, with more than 50 residents infected a troubling development amid cautious optimism that cases in the state may peak more slowly than expected.
